org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.adapter

Class ResourceFacadeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.adapter.ResourceFacadeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.ResourceFacade

    public class ResourceFacadeAdapter
extends Object
implements org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.ResourceFacade
    The resource facade implementation as adapter. Executes Java bean mapping and then delegates the execution to one of the binded adaptee.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy
    See Also:
    ResourceBinder
